title: Chapter 1513 - In High Demand
body:
Chapter 1513 - In High Demand

Unlike Su Yi, most of the cultivators on Immortal Transformation Platform didn’t know the rules that Emissaries of Welcoming were supposed to follow.

Thus, when they heard that dignified voice ring out, many of them surged toward the gates immediately!

“Today’s the day I prove my Dao and become an immortal!” someone shouted. His entire body was swathed in immortal light, and he blurred into a radiant arc as he shot toward the distant Gates of the Immortal Realm.

“When a carp leaps over the dragon’s gate, it too can become a dragon. If we can overcome our Immortal Tribulations, we'll become lofty, carefree immortals!”

“Let’s go!”

One arc of light after another soared into the air.

Everyone charging toward the Gates of the Immortal Realm had a similar sensation. It was as if they were piercing through layer after layer of spatial barriers, crossing the walls between worlds and rising step by step.

The higher they ascended, the more the Laws of spacetime surged around them. They were like a flood relentlessly assailing the cultivators’ bodies, producing a series of wondrous transformations to their bodies and souls.

Their souls, blood vessels, meridians, muscles, bones, and even their pores all underwent...
